c1.name: Wolf's Nature
c1.effect: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

c2.name: Suppression
c2.effect: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.

c3.name: Soul Companion
c3.effect: Increases the level of Lightning Fang by 3. Maximum level is 15.

c4.name: Bite
c4.effect: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

c5.name: Sharpened Claws
c5.effect: Increases the level of Claw and Thunder by 3. Maximum level is 15.

c6.name: Lupus Fulguris
c6.effect: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG. When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.
